name: Mecha Golf
description:
This was made for the mecha game jam. The earth has been attacked by super advanced aliens and but the earth was prepared with their own weponry. However it seems the aliens in fact wern't interested in conquest and have simply requested a round of golf.

controls:

1, 2, and 3 to change weapons

default gun:
left click to lock in the target, left click again to lock in the power, press left click one last time to lock in the aim

rocket gun:
left click to lock in target, click the hole icons as they appear to lock in the aim

laser:
left click to lock in target, 
MASH!!!

only a few days of the  2 weeks were spent on this game so be kind
